Package gamepackage

Class Pieces

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.scene.Node
      • javafx.scene.Parent
        • javafx.scene.layout.Region
          • javafx.scene.layout.Pane
            • javafx.scene.layout.StackPane
              • gamepackage.Pieces
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget
    class Pieces
extends javafx.scene.layout.StackPane
    Pieces contains the game pieces which are eventually moved to the guessbox class to be guessed against the key.
